results.title: Effect of Metformin on HIF-1alpha Signaling and Postoperative Adhesion Formation.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ were treated with vehicle or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 3 days before and until 7 days after induction of @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@peritoneal adhesions@@@; alternatively, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment was discontinued 48 hours before induction of @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@peritoneal adhesions@@@.

citations.NLM: Biller ML, Tuffs C, Bleul M, Tran DT, Dupovac M, Keppler U, Harnoss JM, Probst P, Schneider M, Strowitzki MJ. Effect of Metformin on HIF-1alpha Signaling and Postoperative Adhesion Formation. J Am Coll Surg. 2022 Jun 1;234(6):1167-1180. PMID: 35703816

results.title: The Antitumor Effects of Metformin on Gastric Cancer In Vitro and on Peritoneal Metastasis.

results.title: Metformin Prevents Peritoneal Dissemination via Immune-suppressive Cells in the Tumor Microenvironment.
results.text_hl: This study addressed the immunological effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@peritoneal dissemination@@@.

results.title: The Effect of Metformin on Prognosis in Patients With Locally Advanced Gastric Cancer Associated With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use was an independent prognostic factor of overall survival, @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ recurrence, and @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@peritoneal recurrence@@@.

citations.NLM: Seo HS, Jung YJ, Kim JH, Lee HH, Park CH. The Effect of Metformin on Prognosis in Patients With Locally Advanced Gastric Cancer Associated With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus. Am J Clin Oncol. 2019 Dec;42(12):909-917. PMID: 31693512

results.title: Activation of AMPK enhances neutrophil chemotaxis and bacterial killing.
results.text_hl: In addition to their effects on chemotaxis, treatment of neutrophils with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_AICA_ribonucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031143 @@@aminoimidazole carboxamide ribonucleotide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_AICA_ribonucleotide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031143 @@@AICAR@@@) improved phagocytosis and @DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial@@@ killing, including more efficient eradication of bacteria in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Peritonitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010538 @@@peritonitis@@@-induced @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

citations.NLM: Park DW, Jiang S, Tadie JM, Stigler WS, Gao Y, Deshane J, Abraham E, Zmijewski JW. Activation of AMPK enhances neutrophil chemotaxis and bacterial killing. Mol Med. 2013 Nov 8;19(1):387-98. PMID: 24091934
